dialogue: Do you have any plain jeans?
What do you think of the grey pair on the left?
Sorry, I misspoke. Can you show me dresses instead?
There's a maroon one on the wall on the right, and a brown one and a grey one on the rack.
What's the dress rated?
Which one do you mean?
The grey one on the hanging rack.
That dress has a high rating at 4.3.
I was kind of looking for something more floral.
I'm sorry. I don't have any floral dresses right now.
How about something with a pattern that will make me look taller? A blouse from New Fashion maybe?
I'm sorry. I don't have any blouses like that from New Fashion.
Do you have any good shirts at all?
I have a grey one and a brown one on the table over there.
That brown one should work for me.
Okay. I'll add it to the cart for you.
What do you have from The Vegan Baker?
I don't have anything from that brand right now.
What can you tell me about that sleeveless dress? How much is it? Do you have my size?
Which one do you mean?
I need a new coat, do you have something that would match the rest of my closet?
I do! How do you feel about these? I have a black coat on the back of the front floor rack, another black coat on the upper right, and a brown coat towards the far end of the left wall.
Those look promising! Could you compare sizing on that brown coat and the black coat on the wall?
Of course! The brown coat is shown in size XL and the black one in size L.
Alright, thanks so much! Could you also recommend some jeans to match my closet?
Of course! Take a look at these. I have some grey jeans on the bottom right, another pair of grey jeans on the left wall, second from the left, and a pair of dark blue jeans to the right of those.
I'll think about those, but for now I'll just grab that black coat on the wall.
Ok, I'll go ahead and stick that in your cart for you.
On second thought, make that two.
Of course! I've updated the amount in your cart.
Are there any other black coats you could recommend?
I'm afraid that is the only black coat at the moment.
Alright, I'll take a third one then.
Sure thing, I'll add a third one to your cart.
What about a plain but well-rated jacket?
Sure! How do you feel about these? There's a black jacket in the second cubby from the left and a brown jacket in the next cubby to the right.
Those are alright, but I'm not sure. What's the brand and ratings on that pair of jeans?
Which jeans do you mean?
Do you have any size XS jeans?
I have these three pair on the bottom, what do you think?
What else do you have in denim with good ratings?
Sorry, No results came back from that search.
What size is the pair on the bottom and who makes it?
Sorry, which one?
The jeans on the left.
It's a size L,  from Cats Are Great.
Those two in the center row, the print one and the brown one, do you have something like them with short sleeves?
I'm sorry, we don't.
Let me get the brown coat and the black blouse in the third cubicle then.
I'll make sure those are in your cart.
I need some cheap jeans.
I'm sorry, I don't see any.
I need a new pair of jeans.
Do you like the grey pair in the second cubby or the dark blue pair next to it? They are both jeans.
I'd like to see options with a similar pricing and sizing as those two pairs but in small and denim.
I'm sorry, I don't have anything like that. Can I get you something different?
I'd like to buy the grey pair I think.
Ok. I'll put that pair in your cart for you.
Can you tell me the price and brand of the pants on the bottom?
Which ones?
The grey pair of jeans.
This pair is made by Cats Are Great and costs $164.99.
Can you suggest pants to match my clothes?
I have the grey pair in the very far right cubby.
How about some affordable hoodies?
I'm sorry, I don't have anything like that. Can I get you something different.
I'd like to buy another pair of those grey jeans.
Ok. I'll put that additional pair in your cart for you.
I'd like to see other options like it.
That grey pair, the blue pair next to it, and the grey pair all the way to the left are what I have like that.
What else can you show me?
I'm sorry, that's all I have for jeans.
I'm interested in a hoodie.
How do you feel about this brown one here on the front floor rack, and the brown one in front of it? They are both hoodies.
How mucuh does it cost?
Which item do you mean?
I meant the grey dress on the back floor rack.
It is priced at 124.99.
Anything else for my search?
Sorry, I don't see any other hoodies.
Could you add the red, white blouse from the top right wall rack on the left wall to my cart?
Sure, I added that blouse to your cart.
Could you add another one of that blouse, and the brown hoodie in the front of the front floor rack to my cart as well?
Sure, I went ahead and added those items to your cart for you.
I'm interested in a large coat?
Take a look at this grey one on the center-left top shelf of the wardrobe, the black one on the right top shelf, and the black one on the front floor rack.
I'd like something similar to the grey coat and the black coat on the floor rack, in terms of brand and pattern but with good customer reviews.
The black coat on the floor rack has good customer reviews.
Do you have any good jeans?
What do you think of this grey pair on the bottom right shelf, this dark dark blue pair on the bottom left shelf, and this grey pair to the right of them?
Can you add the black coat from the floor rack to my cart?
Sure, I'll add that item to your cart for you.
Can you help me pick out a decent top?
I think you might be thrilled with either of the multicolored, long-sleeved maroon tops on the left or the light grey tank top near them.
Is there anything else sort of like that long-sleeved festive one on the far left?
The blouse immediately to the right is nearly identical. You might also want the grey and white polka dotted tank a little to the right.
I can't really tell them apart. Can we look at the size of the black shirt instead?
Which items are you interested in learning more about?
Those first two tops on the far left.
Both of those tops are offered in small, large, extra large, and extra extra large, and they both carry a customer rating of 3.8.
I think I feel ever so slightly inclined towards the one on the far left. How does one compare to the solid light grey tank?

The long-sleeved blouse is rated more highly. It has a 3.8, in comparison to the light grey tank's rating of 2.9. The blouse on the left is also available in more sizes. It comes in small, large, extra large, and extra extra large, while the grey tank is only available in medium at this time. While the tank features a solid pattern in a nice light grey color, the top on the left features a holiday pattern in a maroon, white, and blue color scheme. The brands of these shirts also differ. The tank is made by Brain Puzzles, while the long-sleeved blouse is made by Global Voyager. The actual sizes of these pieces are also different. The tank is a medium, while the long-sleeved top is a small. Last but not least, these shirts are both priced at $39.99.
I think I'll go with that shorter sleeved light grey one. Would you add that to my cart please?
Certainly! That grey tank will be in your cart momentarily.
Now can you help me find a nice hoodie?
Do you like these two brown hoodies on the rack up front to the left or the green one in the back left?
Can you show me plain hoodies with good reviews?
How do you like this green one?
Add the black and white blouse to my cart.
Sure, I'll add it.
Narrow down my search to brown items from Downtown Consignment.
Sorry, I don't have anything like what you're looking for.
What's the rating of the other hoodie?
Which hoodie?
The green one on the top right.
It has a 2.8 rating and is available in S, M, and L.
Add that one to my cart.
I'll add it now.
Can you show me well rated blouses?
I have a gray and white one, a maroon, white, and blue one, and a white and black one.
Hello, do you have any jackets for me to look at?
Sure, what do you think of the light grey jacket hanging up high at the back left?
Do you have anything with a similar size range to the black sweater beside the light grey jacket?
Sorry, I don't  have anything similar to that.
What sizes does the sweater come in?
The black one?
Yes exactly.
It's a size XL.
Do you have anything from Pedals & Gears?
I don't have anything from them at the moment.
Do you have anything with a vertical design pattern?
I don't at the moment.
Are there any affordable joggers in a dark green color?
I don't have any right now.
Do you have anything with a spotted pattern in size XL?
Sorry, nothing I have currently matches that description.
What about coats with good reviews in size XL?
The brown coat under the blue shoe boxes on the right fits that description.
Can you compare the brand and size of the two pairs of grey jeans?
Sure, they're actually both from Cats Are Great and a size L.
Do you have any long-sleeved blouses?
We have this black and white one in the middle of the shelf display, the red and white one at the top left of the wall display, and this white and grey one below it.
Do you have other blouses?
We also have this maroon white and blue blouse at the left of the shelf display.
I'd like something like the maroon, white and blue blouse in size range and pattern.
I can't find anything that matches.
Do you have any dresses?
I've got this grey dress, that dark brown one and this brown one on that display rack.
Can you add that grey dress to my cart?
Sure thing.
I need a trousers with a good rating as well.
Here's a grey pair at the bottom of the shelf display.
Can you find me an expensive jacket?
I can't find any jackets that match.
What's the brand and size range for that dress?
Which dress are you referring to?
I mean the grey dress on the display rack.
It's from Yogi Fit and is available in XS, XL, S, XXL, L, and M.
Can you recommend a blouse that goes with my style?
What do you think of the maroon, white, and blue blouse on the left, the white and black on the right, or the grey and white in the middle?
Any other suggestions?
I also have another maroon, white, and blue blouse and a light grey in the middle of the shelf.
Do you have any XS jeans?
I have three pairs of jeans, one in dark blue and two in grey.
What can you tell me about the available sizes of maroon, white, and blue blouse in the middle and the grey and white?
The former comes in XXL, S, XL, and L. The latter is available in M, L, XS, and XL.
Can you tell me the cost and available sizes of the black cost on the right and the grey on the left?
The black costs 139.99 and comes in L, XXL, XS, and M. The grey costs 59.99 and is available in L, XS, and XXL.
Can I see some jeans?
I have a grey pair of jeans on the left and a dark blue beside them.
Tell me about those two blouses
Which blouses do you mean?
The maroon, white, and blue blouse and the light grey, both in the center shelf.
The former has a 3.8 rating and is available in XXL, S, XL, and L. The latter has a 2.9 rating and is only available in M.
Do you have any grey pants?
I have one pair of grey pants on the bottom right.
I need a jacket with long sleeves and a good review
Here's a brown jacket on the second shelf from the right.
Can you add the brown jacket to my cart.
Sure thing
Who makes that jacket?
Which jacket are you referring to?
The brown jacket in the second shelf from the right.
It's from Global Voyager.
Do you have any jackets?
This is a black jacket in the second shelf from the left and the brown jacket in your cart.
I'd like something like the black jacket but with full sleeves.
That black jacket is the only one.
Which trousers match my style?
There's those green trousers at the bottom left of the left shelf display and the grey trousers at the right of the left shelf display.
Hello, are there any yellow and white tank tops with good ratings?
There is one, it's hanging up on the wall at the back of the room.
Is there something like that one but in black and olive?
Unfortunately not right now.  Is there anything else you're after?
Yea, are there any coats with an affordable price tag?
Sure, what do you think of the grey coat hanging up at the top left beside the holiday sweater?
It's not bad.  I like that blouse hanging up at the top at the very back of the room, can you put it in my cart please?  I also want the beige dress on the rack in the middle of the room.
Awesome, I'll add both of those to your cart straight away.
Is there anything in XL?
Sorry, I don't have anything matching that search.
Do you have any blouses with a leafy design pattern?
I do, what do you think of the green, violet and pink blouse underneath the gold shoe boxes?
It's ok.  I'd actually like to see plain patterned items with an affordable price point.
Sorry, I don't have anything like that.
Can you compare the green, violet and pink blouse from this room to the one from the last room?
Yes, they're both from Cats Are great with a leafy design pattern.
Do you have any joggers from Downtown Consignment?  Something on the expensive side if possible.
Yea, there's a dark green pair of joggers at the bottom left.
I need a new blouse.
Ok, I can help you with that! I have a grey and white blouse on the left side, a green, violet, and pink blouse to the right of that, and a black blouse even further to the right.
Those aren't bad, but I love those dark green joggers! Could you put them in my cart for me?
Yes, I'll do so right away!
Awesome, could you recommend any other dark green joggers? Something plain overall with stripes down the side?
I'm afraid those are the only ones currently available like that.
Alright, that's fine. What's the brand on the blouse?
Which item are you referring to?
That grey and white blouse.
That blouse is by Nature Photographers.
Ok, cool. Do you have any other green denim items?
I'm sorry, I don't have anything like that right now. Could I help you with something else?
Yeah, what about some nice shoes? Something highly rated.
Ok, what do you think of these golden shoes on the bottom left of the wall display? They come with great ratings.
Those are alright. How much would those things from before cost me?
Which ones are you thinking of?
The black blouse and the grey and white blouse.
The black blouse costs $54.99 and the grey and white one costs $69.99.
Ok, thanks! What do you have for nice jackets?
I have a black jacket on the back left of this floor rack, what do you think of that?
Hi! Are there any sleeveless dresses that are expensive?
What do you think of the maroon dress, brown dress, and purple dress on the bottom row of that back wall?
Could you compare the maroon dress to the purple dress?
The maroon one is 3.2 while the purple one is 3.6.
How much?
Which ones?
The brown and maroon dresses.
The brown costs $239.99, while the maroon one costs $184.99 Both comes in sizes XS through XXL.
I want something like the maroon and purple dresses, except by 212 Local and with short sleeves.
I couldn't find anything like that.
Okay, just add the purple dress to my cart.
Okay, doing so now.
Is there a holiday blouse by Nature Photographers?
Not that I could find. Wanna look again?
Is there anything like Coats & More?
Not that I could find, again, sorry.
Okay, then how much is the dress you mentioned earlier?
Which one?
The brown dress from before.
It costs $239.99.
COuld you show me a few pairs of jeans please?
I've got the dark blue pair closest to you, the gray ones next to them, and another gray pair in the furthest cabinet.
I'll take the dark blue pair, and the gray ones next to them.
I'll update your cart.
Have you got any tops in a white and gray combo?
At the bottom left on the wall, I have that gray and white top.
I'd like something in a similar size and brand as that, but in green, violet, and pink.
I don't have any tops like that. Could I help you with something else?
Okay, how about a top with sleeves like that one, but with a good rating?
There's that gray and white top, the red plaid top above it, and the Christmas sweater in the second cabinet.
Have you got any hoodies with a good rating I could see?
On the left in the second cabinet from the door, I have that green hoodie.  Then at the front of the closer garment rack, I have the brown hoodie, and another brown hoodie to the left of it.
Can you tell me about the gray jeans in the third closest cabinet on the right, and the dark blue ones next to them?
Well, I can tell you they don't have sleeves, because they're pants.
How about some slacks with a good rating.
In the second closest cabinet on the right I have that gray pair.
I'd like to know the size of the gray pants in the cabinet
For which item?
Which of these tees would go with the rest of my clothes?
At the bottom right of the left wall, I have the blue tee you might like.
Oh, could you tell me the price of that brown hoodie on the circular rack?
Which one do you mean?  There are two next to each other.
The one to the right, I mean.
That is an XXL.
Can you put the hoodie on the left into my cart?  It looks more my size.
Sure thing.  I'll add it now.
Have you got other hoodies I could see?
At the moment, just the two brown hoodies you already saw.
Do any of the hoodies have a good rating?
Both brown hoodies have a good rating.
I'm also interested in seeing some blazers.  What have you got with a good rating in a plain pattern?

On the right wall, I have the black one in the closest cabinet, and on the left wall, I have the brown one in the second cabinet from the door.  Then on the rack to the right of the hoodies, I have another black blazer.
What windbreakers do you have that would go with my wardrobe?
I've got the brown one in the second closest cabinet on the right, and the black one in the third closest cabinet.
Have you got anything like those two brown hoodies?
There's the two brown hoodies, and also the green one in the second cabinet from the door on the left.
Are any of them a S?
Unfortunately, none of my hoodies are an S.
I need a new sweater to match the rest of my closet.
Ok, I can help you with that! What about these black sweaters? I have one on the far top end of the right wall rack and another that's folded on the bottom left corner of the table.
Do you have anything by Yogi Fit that's similar to that one on the table?
Unfortunately, I do not.
Alright, could you tell me how they compare in terms of size and overall rating?
Of course! Both sweaters come with a 3.1 overall rating. The one on the wall is shown in size XL, while the one on the table is displayed in size S.
Great, thanks! I'll take both.
Ok, I've added those to your cart for you.
Actually, I'll take a second one of each please.
Of course, I'll update the amounts.
Alright. Do you have any full-sleeve coats that are well-rated?
I do! Take a look at these. I have a brown coat towards the far end on the left wall, another brown coat on the left side of the front floor rack, and a black coat on the front of the same rack.
Awesome! Tell me the cost and label on that one.
Which one are you referring to?
Any plain coats with good ratings?
Here's a brown one you might like.
What's the rating and price of that item on the top shelf?
Which one?
The gray and white one hanging on the left.
It costs $69.9 and has a 3.9 rating.
Anything else you can show me?
Sorry, I don't have anything else.
I'll take the gray and white blouse and the brown coat.
Ok, I'll add them to your cart.
Can you also add that green hoodie please?
Sure, I'll add it now.
Do you have any good coats?
I have that brown one.
What are the good hoodies around here?
I advise you consider that long-sleeved solid green one.
I do like solid colors, but I'm looking for something with excellent ratings.
In fact, that green hoodie is very highly rated.
Actually, can I edit my search to be for something sleeveless? With excellent ratings of course.
My apologies, but it appears there are no sleeveless plain hoodies with high ratings.
Okay well just show me a hoodie you think would work well with the clothes I tend to wear on a daily basis.
Did you have any interest in that green hoodie? I think you'd really like it!
Fine, you win. Put that green one in my cart.
Right away!
Now let's move on to pants. Do your thing and pick out a pair that fits my style.
The grey pants on the right would be very cohesive with the rest of your wardrobe.
Okay but I want long sleeves.
There are no long-sleeved trousers, unfortunately.
Any of these jeans worth taking a look at?
I recommend you consider the two pairs in the middle of that set of shelves.
I want something in the same color as that grey pair, but can you get me something with high ratings?
Actually, those grey jeans have favorable reviews.
I'd still like to see some more options.
Unfortunately, I cannot find any more for you. Is there something else I can assist you with today?
I'd also like to know if there are any highly rated hoodies in small.
That green hoodie hanging over the blue jeans meets your wishes.
Wow that grey and white spotted tank top on the left looks very stylish. I'd like that in my cart please.
I will add it to your cart right away.
Do you think you might be able to find some good grey pants on this side?
How about the pair in the middle of those other two grey pants?
Huh, that grey coat towards the left sure looks nice. I guess I'm just really into grey today. Find me a grey coat just like it that has excellent reviews.
That grey coat is all I can find, sorry.
In that case, just show me whatever other coats you've got.
Could I interest you in the black one hanging on the far right?
I'd like to hear what sizes both of those are made in.
The black coat comes in extra small, medium, large, and extra extra large, while the grey one comes in extra small, large, and extra extra large.
Can you show me some plain t-shirts with good ratings?
What do you think of the blue t-shirt in the back corner?
Any other suggestions?
That is the only t-shirt I have right now.
What can you tell me about the two pairs of grey jeans on the left?
Both are display jeans.
Do you have any dress suggestions for me?
I have two grey dresses and a beige on the rack to the right. What do you think?
I'll take the grey one to the far right, please.
Absolutely, I've placed that in your cart.
Do you have any cheap coats?
Do you like the grey coat in the middle?
Have anything with the same kind of pattern and brand as the light grey blouse and the maroon, white, and blue, but in brown?
I don't have any blouses like that. Maybe something different?
What grey pants can you recommend?
How about the ones to the very right?
What about anything with denim patterning in large?
I didn't find any for trousers.
How about any hoodies from Downtown Consignment?
The green hoodie to the right might work.
Hm... actually I think I'll take that blouse to the very left.
You got it. Adding now.
You know, add the grey jeans to the under that blouse and the dark blue jeans to the very right too.
Adding those for you now.
Any other trousers to show with good reviews?
How about the grey pants, third from the left?
They need to be XS.
Actually, that pair is XS.
I'd like jeans with a good rating please.
I have the dark blue pair in the left cubby, the grey pair in the next cubby over, and the grey pair in the rightmost cubby.
What else do you have?
I'm sorry, I don't have any other jeans with good ratings.
What is the rating and size of the coat?
Which one?
The grey coat hanging in the second cubby from the left?
This one is rated 4.6 and is extra small.
Can you tell me the sizes and ratings of the maroon blouse in the same cubby and the grey and white blouse in the next cubby over?
The maroon one is small and rated 3.8.. The grey one is large and rated 3.9.
Do you have something else with a similar color and sleeve length as the black jacket in the second cubby and the brown one in the next cubby over?
I have this black one in the second cubby like that.
Do you have any black and white blouses by Pedals & Gears?
Do you like the blouse hanging up on the top row of the wall? It is by Pedals & Gears.
Can you tell me the ratings and sizes of that black and white one and the maroon one?
The maroon one is rated 3.8 and is small. The black one is rated 3.6 and is also small.
I'd like something with a similar brand and price as those two purple dresses but sleeveless and in extra large.
The purple dress on the right is what I have to show you like that.
How about jackets then?
Do you like the light grey one up on the wall? It is a jacket.
Hello. Are there any XL T-shirts with half sleeves?
I found a blue T-shirt hanging on the back left wall.
Is there anything else with a good rating that doesn't cost that much?
Not that I could find, sorry. Want to make another search?
Is there any T-shirt?
Only the blue one I showed you.
Add the red and white blouse in the back left, as well as the beige dress in the back middle rack.
Sure thing.
Could you make sure it's by Yogi Fit and with a good rating?
I couldn't find anything like that, sorry.
Okay, is there a cheap hoodie then?
No, not that either. Want to search for a different item?
Go ahead and add the pink sweater in the back right to my cart, along with the white and black blouse in the frontmost rack.
Sure thing.
Compare the prices of the black and white blouse and white, black, and red blouse in the back and front racks respectively.
The black and white one is $4.99 while the other is $79.99.
Is there something similar in available sizing and brand to the black blouse in the back rack, and the white and black blouse, except sleeveless.
Sorry, couldn't find anything like that. Wanna search again?
Do you have any grey striped pants?
What do you think of the ones on the right?
Ooh, give me that black blouse on the rack in the back.
Okay. I've added it to your cart.
What kind of coats do you have?
There's a black one and a brown one on this rack in the front and a black coat in the first cubby on the right.
How do the black one in the cubby and the brown jacket compare on size?
The brown one is an XL and the black one is a L.
I'll take that brown one and the other brown one next to the white and grey shirt in the cubby.
Okay. I'll add those items to your cart.
Do you have any XS trousers with good ratings.
What do you think of the grey pair?
What's the brand of that brown coat on the rack? I'd like to know about the black one on the wall too.
The black one is from Cats Are Great and the brown is from Downtown Stylists.
Can you show me some dresses in plain colors?
I'd be happy to! I can offer you two beige dresses on the floor rack to the right and the black and olive one, also on the same rack.
OK, can we stick to the pattern no designs?
For that pattern, I can shw you three more dresses on the same rack: the brown one, the dark brown one, and the grey one.  Does any of them look good?
Yes, can you help me compare the dark brown dress to the grey one?

Sure! The sleeveless plain-color dark brown dress from Global Voyager is available in M and shown in M. It enjoys a rating of 4.7 and costs 24.99.  The sleeveless plain-color grey dress from Yogi Fit is shown in  XXL and in stock in XS, S, M, L, XL, and XXL. It has a high rating of 4.3 and costs 124.99.
Thank you! I will buy the brown dress on the left side of the floor hanger and the beige one that is also on the left side of that hanger, please.
Sure! I am adding these dresses to your cart as we speak.
Please also add that black and olive dress on the same hanger.
Certainly! You will see it in your cart in a moment.
My next question is whether you have quality shows to show me.
I can offer you the grey model in the fourth bottom-most compartment from the left in the first cupboard on the left.
Thanks! Another request: do you have a nice sweater from Downtown Consignment?
I have the the black sweater in the middle of the second compartment from the left in the first cupboard on our left.
What decent trousers do you see, if any?
Those grey ones on the far right would be a great buy!
That multicolored purplish short-sleeved top is so charming! Would you be a doll and put it in my cart for me?
With pleasure! That top will be in your cart soon.
I want to know the manufacturer for that one
Which item would you like to know those details on?
The multicolored short-sleeved top with the kind of floral-looking design.
Cats Are Great is the brand that makes that top. Currently this top has small, large, and extra extra large in stock.
Can you tell me what distinguishes it from that biker-looking black studded tank on the left?

The short-sleeved blouse in green, violet, and pink is an extra extra large and is also offered in small and large. The white and black sleeveless tank is an extra small and is also offered in small, medium, large, and extra large. The short-sleeved blouse is rated higher, at 3.5 in comparison to the tank's rating of 3.1.
Now for the most important question. Which one costs less? And I'm gonna need to hear the sizes again. My brain can only process so much information at once.

The multicolored short-sleeved blouse is available in small, large, and extra extra large, while the black and white tank is available in everything from extra small to extra large. These shirts actually cost the exact same price of $19.99.
It's going to be tough to decide. Can I also look at some running pants?
There's a nice pair of dark green joggers on the far left.
Can you show me jackets?
Do you like the light grey one hanging up on the top of the wall? It is a jacket.
